message.name: SHURIKEN.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: You can throw one additional shuriken.

dictionary.message: Compact and effective weaponÐµ. There are 5 shurikens per turn. The first direct hit on every enemy deals double damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 17 hp per throw. The first direct hit at a target deals double damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Improved targeting. The damage of each knife is increased by 5 hp

dictionary.message: There are 5 knives per turn. The first direct hit on every enemy deals double damage. Additionally, targeting is highlighted.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 22 hp per throw. The first direct hit at a target deals double damage.

message.name: SHURIKEN.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: No bonus damage for the first hit. Instead, master shurikens go through several enemies, dealing high damage.

dictionary.message: Shurikens saw through enemies, dealing massive damage, and dissapear only when they hit the ground. There are 4 shurikens per turn.

message.name: MORTAR.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Explosion damage increased by 10 hp. Improved targeting.

dictionary.message: Shoots with powerful missile, unaffected by the wind. The initial speed can't be regualted. The missile emits 5 shards when exploding. Additionally, targeting is highlighted.

message.name: MORTAR.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 5 fragments - 25 hp each.

message.name: MORTAR.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Explosion damage increased by 5 hp more, damage from each shard - by 10 hp. Explosion radius is also increased.

dictionary.message: Shoots with destructive missile, unaffected by the wind. Missile and shards have large explosion radius. Targeting is highlighted.

message.name: MORTAR.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 50 hp from explosion, 5 fragments - 35 hp each.

message.name: MORTAR.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Shoots additional missile after the first one.

dictionary.message: Shoots two missiles at once! The initial speed can't be regualted. Targeting is highlighted.

message.name: MORTAR.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 5 fragments - 25 hp each.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Emits additional fragment on explosion. Damage from explosion increased by 5 hp.

dictionary.message: Grenade is unaffected by the wind. Deals massive damage with its fragments. It is very effectice in enclosed space.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 9 fragments - 15 hp each.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Fragments automatically target the nearest enemies.

dictionary.message: Grenade is unaffected by the wind. Emits 9 fragments on explosion, which automatically target on one of the nearest enemies in 0.5 sec.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 9 fragments - 15 hp each.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Explodes automatically near the enemy, timer is absent. Fragments float to nearest enemy. If the grenade doesn't hit an enemy, it stays on the ground.

dictionary.message: Grenade is unaffected by the wind. Explodes automatically near the enemy. If the grenade doesn't hit an enemy, it stays on the ground and explodes if enemy approaches.

message.name: CL_GRENADE.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 45 hp from explosion, 9 fragments - 15 hp each.

dictionary.message: Sticks to any surface. Releases 8 fragments that are unaffected by the wind and fly to the air.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 8 fragments - 20 hp each.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Grenade and its fragments place poison for 2 turns.

dictionary.message: Sticks to any surface. Releases 8 fragments that are unaffected by the wind. Grenade and its fragments place poison for 2 turns.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 8 fragments - 20 hp each.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Damage from the fragments increased by 5 hp. Fragments that don't hit an enemy stay on the ground for 5 turns.

dictionary.message: Sticks to any surface. Releases 8 fragments that are unaffected by the wind. Fragments that don't hit an enemy stay on the ground (like mines) for 5 turns.

message.name: STICKY_BOMB.DAMAGE.U2B
message.value: 40 hp from explosion, 8 fragments - 25 hp each.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Two additional pellets, damage of each pellet is increased by 1 hp

dictionary.message: Shoots 9 pellets in a volley. Effective in close combat.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Damaged enemies are slowed for 2 turns. Damage of each pellet increased by 1 hp more.

dictionary.message: Remington shots deal massive damage at close combat and slows enemies for 2 turns.

message.name: SHOTGUN.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Allows to make 2 shots, 6 pellets each.

dictionary.message: Devastating weapon for close combat, which shoots twice per turn.

message.name: MINIGUN.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage of each bullet increased by 2 hp.

dictionary.message: Powerful minigun, capable of turning your enemy into a sieve. Shoots 20 bullets with high damage.

message.name: MINIGUN.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Each direct hit at the enemy lowers his armor by 2 till the end of turn.

dictionary.message: Heavy weapon, specially created to take down armored targets. Each direct hit lowers the enemy's armor by 2 till the end of turn.

message.name: MINIGUN.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Shoots rockets instead of bulets, which are capable to aim at enemies.

dictionary.message: Shoots a volley of 10 rockets, which has high damage and explosion radius, and also are capable to correct the trajectory and aim directly at the enemy.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increased by 10 hp. Laser beam fluctuations are lowered, and its length is increased.

dictionary.message: Capable to pierce several enemies with one shot. Comparing to normal sniper rifle, laser beam fluctuations are lowered, and its length is increased.

message.name: SNIPER_RIFLE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 100 hp for the first target, each subsequent target gets lower damage.

dictionary.message: Improved standard weapon. Affected by the wind.

message.name: BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Allows to destroy up to 2 obstacles with one shot. Makes 2 explosions, with the damage of 40 hp.

dictionary.message: Allows to take out an enemy, who cowardly hid behind a wall. Missile destroys up to 2 obstacles. Affected by the wind.

message.name: GRENADE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Two additional minor explosions with 20 hp damage.

dictionary.message: Improved grenade. Isn't affected by the wind. When bomb explodes, it produces 2 minor explosions with slight delay.

message.name: GRENADE.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 60 hp from first explosion, 20 hp from 2 minor explosions.

message.name: GRENADE.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Slows damaged units for 1 turn, additional minor explosion.

dictionary.message: Units hit by this grenade are slowed by 1 turn. Isn't affected by the wind. When bomb explodes, it produces 3 minor explosions with slight delay.

message.name: GRENADE.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 60 hp from first explosion, 20 hp from 3 additional.

message.name: RIFLE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Improved crosshair, damage from each bullet increased by 5 hp.

dictionary.message: Perfect weapon for straight shots. You can make two shots for one turn. Improved crosshair.

message.name: HOMING.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage is increased by the time of flying. Maximal bonus - 40 hp.

dictionary.message: Rocket reaches the target by the shortest flight path. It fits perfectly for long distances. Damage is increased by the time of flying.

message.name: HOMING.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Maximal bonus from the time of flying is increased to 80 hp.

dictionary.message: Rocket reaches the target by the shortest flight path. Damage is increased by the time of flying. Great at large and very large distances.

message.name: HARPOON.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage on hit is increased by 10 hp, improved crosshair.

dictionary.message: Hooks up and pulls an enemy, doing damage by electricity while dragging. Improved crosshair.

message.name: HARPOON.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 50 hp when the target is hit, 10 hp/4 times per second while dragging.

dictionary.message: Hooks up and pulls an enemy, dealing massive damage by electricity while dragging. Improved crosshair.

message.name: HARPOON.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 50 hp when the target is hit, 13 hp/4 times per second while dragging.

message.name: HARPOON.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Shoots an energy bullet instead of a harpoon. Bullet deals 120 damage, irrespective of victim's armor or unit's attack.

dictionary.message: Shoots an energy bullet which ignores both victim's armor and unit's attack. Improved crosshair.
Allows you to dig tunnels under the ground (either horizontally or angularly). Slightly injures and pushes the enemy.

message.name: BLOW_TORCH.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: When a unit starts digging, it leaves a sensor mine behind, which lasts 1 turn and is not triggered by allies.

dictionary.message: Allows to dig tunnels in the earth. When a unit starts digging, it leaves a sensor mine behind, which lasts 1 turn and is not triggered by allies.

message.name: BLOW_TORCH.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 24 hp per second. Mine damage - 45 hp.

message.name: MINE.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Explosion radius increased, damage increased by additional 5 hp.

message.name: UZI.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: The damage of each bullet is increased by 1 hp.

dictionary.message: Shoots in short bursts, almost no disperse. Can be controlled while shooting.

message.name: HOLY_GRENADE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage increased by 20 hp., also explosion radius is increased.

message.name: SPIDER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Shoots a poison bolt in its victim, aside from explosion. The bolt deals 10 damage and always hits target.

dictionary.message: Tarantula crawls up to an enemy and stands on it. If the enemy moves out, the spider will detonate and shoot a poison bolt.

message.name: SPIDER.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 65 hp from explosion, 10 hp from poison bolt.

message.name: DYNAMITE.DISTINCT.U1A
message.value: On explosion 2 sticks fly away and explode on collision.

dictionary.message: Detonates in 3 seconds after setup, leaving a large hole in the ground. On explosion 2 sticks fly away and explode on collision with ground or unit.

message.name: DYNAMITE.DAMAGE.U1A
message.value: 75 hp from the first explosion, 55 hp from each stick.

message.name: DYNAMITE.DISTINCT.U1B
message.value: The unit explodes at the end of a turn, dealing 70 hp of damage. Belt activation doesn't spend a turn.

dictionary.message: Kamikaze belt gives a chance to heavily wounded units to deal decent damage at their last turn. Activation doesn't spend a turn. At the end of a turn unit explodes, dealing damage to nearby units and to the ground.

message.name: DYNAMITE.DAMAGE.U1B
message.value: 70 hp at the end of a turn

message.name: CANNON.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Shooting unit gets an opportunity to run away after the shot.

dictionary.message: Shoots with the cannon ball which detonates only after full stop. The shot power is not regulated.

message.name: CANNON.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Improved crosshair, damage increased by 15 hp.

dictionary.message: Shoots with the cannon ball which detonates only after full stop. The shot power is not regulated. Improved crosshair.

message.name: SHOCKER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Slows the damaged targets for 2 turns, increased damage.

dictionary.message: Close combat weapon based on the direct impact of electric charge on the biological target. Damaged units are slowed for 2 turns.

message.name: CARPET_BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Carpet damage increases per each bounce.

message.name: CARPET_BAZOOKA.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 2 bounces, 50 hp first strike damage, every bounce increases damage by 5 hp.

message.name: CARPET_BAZOOKA.DAMAGE.U2A
message.value: 3 bounces, 50 hp first strike damage, every bounce increases damage by 5 hp.

message.name: CARPET_BAZOOKA.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Carpets ignite the land on impact.

dictionary.message: Shoots a carpet which bounces several times at a random direction. Carpets ignite the land on impact.

message.name: GIRDER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Enables to change girder size before placement.

message.name: GIRDER.NOTE.U1
message.value: Cannot be placed on the ground or near other objects. You may change the size before placement by up/down buttons.

message.name: SHEEP.DESCR.U1A
message.value: Robotic ram, which can be controlled by left/right keys.

message.name: SHEEP.DESCR.U1B
message.value: Moves at the pointed direction but can turn around if runs into an obstacle or try to jump over it. Throws fire while running.

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.DESCR.U2
message.value: Instantly transfers unit to a random point at a middle range. Doesn't waste a turn. Can be used in the air. Avoids mines and laser beams.

message.name: EMERGENCY_TELEPORT.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Always avoids mines and laser beams.

message.name: BOOMERANG.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Damage from second hit increased by 15 hp.

message.name: BOOMERANG.DAMAGE.U1
message.value: 65 hp from first hit, 80 hp from second.

message.name: BOOMERANG.DISTINCT.U2
message.value: Damage increased by 10 hp, second ht knocks enemy's hat down.

message.name: BOOMERANG.DAMAGE.U2
message.value: 75 hp from first hit, 90 hp from second.

dictionary.message: When boomerang hits the enemy or the ground, it bounces, and you may try to catch it and throw again. For the second throw, boomerang won't bounce. Greatly affected by the wind. Knocks enemy's hat down.
Behaves just like a grenade. Allows the user to relocate to the place, where the teleport happened to stop after a toss. You may press SPACE to teleport before full stop with 1 second delay.

message.name: TELE_THROWER.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Allows to teleport before full stop by pressing SPACE.

dictionary.message: Removes ice from the user and protects him from freezing and slowing for 2 turns. Also heals 60 hp and cures poison. Spends a turn!

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.DISTINCT.U1
message.value: Cures poison, health gain increased by 10 hp.

dictionary.message: Drink of true berserker! Removes ice from the user, increases attack by 30% and protects him from freezing and slowing for 2 turns. Also heals 70 hp and cures poison. Spends a turn!

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.DISTINCT.U2A
message.value: Increases attack by 30%, health gain increased by additional 10 hp.

dictionary.message: Removes ice from the user, increases armor by 30% and protects him from freezing and slowing for 2 turns. Also heals 70 hp and cures poison. Spends a turn!

message.name: ANTIFREEZE.DISTINCT.U2B
message.value: Increases armor by 30%, health gain increased by additional 10 hp.
